00037 BEHAVIOR_STATUS SpawnShip::execute(void* agent)
00038 {
00039         Ship* opponent = new Ship();
00040         opponent->displayHeading.set_degrees(180);
00041         if (shipType == 1)
00042                 opponent->setSprite("Hulls\\drone");
00043         else if (shipType == 2)
00044                 opponent->setSprite("Hulls\\Drone1");
00045         else if (shipType == 3)
00046                 opponent->setSprite("Hulls\\Fighter1");
00047         
00048         opponent->projectileBrain = &makeBoringBrain;
00049                 opponent->brain->addChild(new TurnTowardsTarget(1));
00050                 opponent->brain->addChild(( new RepeatNode(-1))->addChild(
00051                         (new SequentialNode())
00052                                 ->addChild(new BoolCondition<GameObject>(&GameObject::alignedWithPlayer,true))
00053                                 ->addChild(new Fire())
00054                                 ->addChild(new Cooldown(500))));
00055                 ProbabilityNode* probNode = new ProbabilityNode(); //get out of the way in a random direction when not near an edge
00056                 probNode->addChild((
00057                         new SequentialNode())
00058                                 ->addChild(new AbsoluteMovement(LEFT,10,200)))
00059                         ->addChild((new SequentialNode())
00060                                 ->addChild(new AbsoluteMovement(RIGHT,10,200)));
00061 
00062                 opponent->brain
00063                         ->addChild((new RepeatNode(-1)) ->addChild((new SequentialNode())
00064                         ->addChild(new BoolCondition<GameObject>(&GameObject::playerIsAligned,true))
00065                                 ->addChild(probNode)));
00066                         
00067 
00068         ws->insertObject(opponent,point(100,100));
00069         return BT_SUCCESS;
00070 }
